    Class Shape

    Represents an abstract base class for defining shapes in a graphics context.

    Inheritance
    object
    Shape
    BufferedSpriteShape
    CircleShape
    FrameShape
    GlypheShape
    Light2DShape
    LineShape
    PlaneShape
    QubeShape
    RectShape
    SpriteShape

    vbo

    Gets or sets the Vertex Buffer Object (VBO) associated with the shape.

    Declaration

    Methods

    GetShape()

    Gets the vertices defining the shape.

    Declaration
    public abstract float[] GetShape()
    Returns
    Type Description
    float[]

    An array of floating-point values representing the vertices of the shape.
